objective: User Sarah Chen in Building B can't print to the networked printer. She can connect to it but documents won't print. What's wrong?

problem_context.focus: User-level troubleshooting - verify Sarah's print configuration, driver status, document format, and basic connectivity
questions: What specific error message appears when Sarah tries to print?
Has Sarah successfully printed to this printer before?
Are other users in Building B able to print to the same networked printer?
What document format is Sarah trying to print (PDF, Word, etc.)?
Are there any pending print jobs in Sarah's print queue?

steps.description: Gather initial information about the issue
steps.findings: {'printer_name': 'networked printer in Building B', 'status': 'online', 'ip_address': '192.168.1.157', 'jobs_in_queue': 2, 'paper_level': '97%', 'toner_level': '97%', 'last_job': '5 minutes ago'}

steps.description: Test hypothesis and verify root cause

steps.reasoning: Fix issue and confirm it's resolved
Create knowledge for future similar issues
